channel.title: New skill announced: Divination
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KBkIvdU6XTM http://au.ign.com/articles/2013/05/03/runescape-3-announced-with-huge-graphical-overhaul
'Going to involve the power of the gods'
From what I could gather the new skills were going to be resource skills similar to mining, fishing etc so this has me quite curious.

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:18, topic:518742”][quote author=Rodgerwilco link=topic=637006.msg4294972#msg4294972 date=1368053738]
I live in Arizona and the price of gas is $3.20 right now…
[/quote]
Our price per gallon is $5.30 ($1.40 per litre) – you’re lucky.
And I suspect the British are even unluckier than I am.[/quote]
You’re lucky, here in Finland gas price is 1.727(2.31$)/litre.
Bit off-topic, sorry for that

Read full topic

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:117, topic:518742”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=637006.msg4353894#msg4353894 date=1377132346]

Now someone dump it from the cache and give it to me so I can add it in my 1337 UB3R S3RV3R

Someone already has. That’s how I made the gif of the emote.
[/quote]
Link pl0x?[/quote]
Here’s the video of it. But there isn’t much else about the cache. You could PM the guy on YouTube who made the video because he has it on his server.

Read full topic

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:116, topic:518742”][quote author=Java-RSPS-Noob link=topic=637006.msg4353880#msg4353880 date=1377130939]

[quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=637006.msg4353857#msg4353857 date=1377128673]

Skillcape emote:

[/quote]fail emote is fail

It’s actually not that bad and it follows what you do with the skill.
[/quote]er what do you mean

In the emote, you turn into a wisp and float around. With the skill, there are wisps floating around a crater and you activate them and they turn into a spring.

Now someone dump it from the cache and give it to me so I can add it in my 1337 UB3R S3RV3R

Someone already has. That’s how I made the gif of the emote.[/quote]
Link pl0x?

Read full topic

It’s actually not that bad and it follows what you do with the skill.
[/quote]er what do you mean[/quote]
In the emote, you turn into a wisp and float around. With the skill, there are wisps floating around a crater and you activate them and they turn into a spring.

sk8rdude461:

Now someone dump it from the cache and give it to me so I can add it in my 1337 UB3R S3RV3R

Someone already has. That’s how I made the gif of the emote.

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“Java-RSPS-Noob, post:99, topic:518742”]We all know where you are coming from but honestly what game doesn’t have micro transactions. Look at WoW, look at ROTM, and etc.

You are making a big deal out of nothing.[/quote]

You can’t justify what they are doing by pointing out that other games have the same flaw. Micro transactions are treated differently in alot of games, but a large portion of the time they are considerably more balanced compared to what Jagex does.

It is well known that they are vastly hypocritical in their game breaking transactions because they state within their own rules that they don’t want real life influence to play a part in how you can play the game. Squeal of fortune does exactly that giving players the ability to buy experience, items and gold with real life money.

I refuse to derail this even further, please get back onto the topic of the skill

Read full topic

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Java-RSPS-Noob:

We all know where you are coming from but honestly what game doesn’t have micro transactions. Look at WoW, look at ROTM, and etc

Blizzard only adds new items to the shop every 2 or 3 months, and there are very few of them

Frell:

WoW’s model of micro-transactions is superb. The stuff you can buy only looks slightly better than the default mounts, but the mounts earned from pvp/raids look much better than the store mounts. And in WoW you get made fun of for having the store mounts because they involve no work, and you don’t even feel unique with them because so many people buy them.

3lv3n snip3r:

You’re not forced to buy anything from Solomon’s. Also, nothing from Solomon’s gives you an advantage whether it be in combat or skilling; they are just cosmetic overrides. Most of them look pretty cool too.

Thats such a stupid way of thinking though, wouldn’t you rather know that because you’re paying monthly you have access to EVERYTHING in the game? So what if its only looks. Alot of people buy them and it just ruins the feel of gameplay.

I wouldn’t be as mad if Jagex didn’t add SO MUCH stuff, theres too many things. Head butt mining? Roundhouse kicking trees? Pegasus flying teleports? Its wayyy too overdone. They’re relying on Solomons too much. Much more than any other game I’ve seen.

Read full topic

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:98, topic:518742”]And just like I predicted in my last post on this thread, guess what they added today? More solomon armors!

Every single player should be feeling cheated, runescape is like an interactive mall not a game[/quote]
You’re not forced to buy anything from Solomon’s. Also, nothing from Solomon’s gives you an advantage whether it be in combat or skilling; they are just cosmetic overrides. Most of them look pretty cool too.

Read full topic

Every single player should be feeling cheated, runescape is like an interactive mall not a game[/quote]Does this veteran beast armor make my butt look big? :palm:

We all know where you are coming from but honestly what game doesn’t have micro transactions. Look at WoW, look at ROTM, and etc.

You are making a big deal out of nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:91, topic:518742”][quote author=Phaze One link=topic=637006.msg4348725#msg4348725 date=1376324795]

Frell:

p2p is no longer p2p because it ruins the game when kids are using their parents money to pay for ridiculously over exaggerated extra content that isn’t even lore friendly. Have looked at some of the shit on solomons?

What if it’s your own money?

Failing to see how the new skill isn’t “lore friendly” when it co resides directly with the rs3 BOL theme.

You quite obviously didn’t bother to read what he posted. It is also highly irrelevant who’s money it is, jagex’s micro transaction system is a joke. Their latest atrocity was taking an incredibly rare and highly sought after pet completely redundant by introducing the same thing (almost) on the soloman’s store
[/quote]They aren’t the same thing at all, and quite frankly are distinctly different. One is blatantly a mini Vorago, and one is blatantly a mini Vitalis. Two entirely different things that players can distinguish between.

And last I checked, people seek the Seismic weaponry far more than the Vitalis pet, “highly sought after” my ass; It’s not even cute (or worth max cash).[/quote]

The vitalis pet comes into the slot of incredibly rare and only sought after because it is so rare and difficult to obtain. Fact of the matter is that releasing one on the soloman’s store makes the other one look obsolete and by my definition, definitely decreases the value of owning the pet.

Read full topic

@mihalich wrote:

Phaze One:

Been confirmed to come out on the 20th, gg mihalich

830k to go

item.title: New skill announced: Divination
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Java-RSPS-Noob:

[quote=Frell]p2p is no longer p2p because it ruins the game when kids are using their parents money to pay for ridiculously over exaggerated extra content that isn’t even lore friendly. Have looked at some of the shit on solomons?

What if it’s your own money?

Failing to see how the new skill isn’t “lore friendly” when it co resides directly with the rs3 BOL theme.[/quote]
I never said divination wasn’t lore friendly I said the stuff on solomons isn’t.

It doesn’t matter whose money it is that was just a joke but you get the idea

If you keep an eye on the news look how often they throw new stuff into the solomons store. Theres more shit on the solomons store than stuff you can acquire ingame by now. Jagex is probably THE best example of micro-transactions gone wrong.

Read full topic
